name: Dimmable Bulb
info:
# Dimmable Bulb

This is a dimmable bulb. The Characteristic Properties enable brightness. It is a white bulb which can be adjusted from 0 to 100% brightness.

func:
let sliderValue = msg.payload; // Get the slider value
let command = "LOAD 1 " + sliderValue + "\r\n"; // Construct the command

msg.payload = command; // Set the modified command as the new payload
return msg; // Return the modified message
